name: ECARC Alpha
description:
Shoot down all those enemies in ECARC using all your Exploding Cannonballs and Ricocheting Chakrams!

ECARC (Exploding Cannonballs and Ricocheting Chakrams) is a 2D Physics-based game. Your objective is to kill all the enemies in each level with 6 cool Weapons, use Physic rules to your advantage! ECARC is under active development.

HTML5 EDITION:
The HTML5 Edition is a toned down version of ECARC that doesn't include Checkpoints, Weekly Challenge trying limits and a bunch of other stuff. To get the full feeling of the game, try the Windows version. I also recommend using the Fullscreen button.

CONTROLS:
LMB: Shoot
Numbers (1-6): Switch Weapons
R: Restart the current level
F: Load last Checkpoint
SPACE or Q: Cycle through all Weapons
G: GameJolt Login
H: Submit GameJolt Score
TAB: Commandier

ECARC COMMANDIER:
You've all probably played Source Engine games (and a lot of other games have this too). The Commandier is just another Console/Codebox system you can use to modify the Gameplay, Cheat, and stuff! Read 'commandier.txt' for info.

GAMEJOLT API INTEGRATION:
ECARC (Both Windows and HTML5 Editions) support GameJolt Scoreboards/Trophies (known as Achievements in-game). View the Scoreboard/Trophies on ECARC's GameJolt page.

ECARC is also available on GameJolt, IndieDB and GameMaker: Studio's Steam Workshop. Please note, the last two are updated later than itch.io/GameJolt.
